required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase Ⅱ Clinical Study Trial of Felbinac Trometamol Injection in China
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Dose-exploratory Phase II Clinical Trial to Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Felbinac Trometamol Injection in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Pain After Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: A multicenter, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, dose-exploratory phase II clinical trial to evaluating the efficacy and safety of Felbinac Trometamol Injection in the treatment of moderate to severe pain after surgery.Main purpose is preliminary evaluation the effectiveness of Felbinac Trometamol Injection in the treatment of moderate and severe pain after surgery.Secondary purpose is to explore the dosage regimen of Felbinac Trometamol Injection in the treatment of moderate and severe pain after surgery, and provide data support for later clinical trial.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: The the total amount of morphine within 24 hours after the end of first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the pain intensity curve(AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: Pain intensity under exercise/rest state - area under the time curve
The first time to press the analgesic pump for analgesia

secondary_outcome.measure: Total number of analgesia pump presses
secondary_outcome.description: Total number of analgesic pump presses within 24 hours after the first dose

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of effective presses of analgesia pump
secondary_outcome.description: The number of effective presses of analgesia pump within 24 hours after the end of the first dose

arm_group.description: Generic name:Felbinac Trometamol Injection; Placebo:normal saline Dosage form:Injection Dosage:47.13mg Volume:2ml Frequency:Multi-dose Duration:1 day. A total of 40 subjects,40 received the test drug .

Generic name:Felbinac Trometamol Injection; Placebo:normal saline Dosage form:Injection Dosage:94.25mg Volume:4ml Frequency:Multi-dose Duration:1 day. A total of 40 subjects,40 received the test drug .

Generic name:Felbinac Trometamol Injection; Placebo:normal saline Dosage form:Injection Dosage:188.5mg Volume:8ml Frequency:Multi-dose Duration:1 day. A total of 40 subjects,40 received the test drug .
Generic name:Placebo; Placebo:normal saline Dosage form:Injection Dosage:4ml/injection Volume:10ml Frequency:Multi-dose Duration:1 day. A total of 40 subjects,40 received the placebo.

intervention.description: Felbinac Trometamol Injection diluted to 100 ml with 0.9% sodium chloride injection,a 30-minute period using a Microinjection pump. One dose at 8h and 16h after the start of the first dose,the first intravenous infusion was started at the end of the operation (Skin suture completes the last stitch).the drug was given 3 times,3 times/day,once every 8 hours.

Placebo diluted to 100 ml with 0.9% sodium chloride injection,a 30-minute period using a Microinjection pump. One dose at 8h and 16h after the start of the first dose,the first intravenous infusion was started at the end of the operation (Skin suture completes the last stitch).the drug was given 3 times,3 times/day,once every 8 hours.

overall_official.affiliation: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
